Package com.pizzeria.training.models

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.pizzeria.training.models.Order
Record Components:
_id - The MongoDB document Id.
pizzas - The pizzas ordered by the customer
customerIdString - The hex string of the _id of the Customer that ordered the pizza(s).
cost - The cost of the Order
tip - The tip paid by the customer in addition to the cost
setAsFavorite - Whether or not the Order's pizzas should be saved as the Customer's favoriteOrder.
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
teodorojr.delson, stephen.gruver
